rows.label: bf11290100_0010
rows.name: At first I thought to take it.

rows.label: bf11290100_0020
rows.name:
But I'd made it for her. 
And I'd like her to keep it forever.

rows.label: bf11290100_0040
rows.name:
So... The bitch is dead, is she? 
Shame, I had a soft spot for her.

rows.label: bf11290100_0060
rows.name:
Heh. Guess you learned how to
use a weapon, at least.

rows.label: bf11290100_0070
rows.name:
Big change from a tiny kid tryin' not
to piss 'erself in fear.
